Name: Reviving Nightmare
Desc:
Enhances Unforgettable Nightmare.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Unforgettable Nightmare or higher
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th skill, Endless Nightmare.

H.Old:
HP Cost: 50. Attacks 6 enemies at 270% damage 6 times.
Cooldown: 2 sec
H.New:
HP Cost: 50. Attacks up to 6 enemies at 270% Damage 6 times.
Cooldown: 2 sec.
